channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-17277] HiveMetastoreClient Log name is wrong
item.description: The name of Log for HiveMetastoreClient is "hive.metastore". It's confused for users to trace hive log

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Cancelling and resubmitting the patch in an attempt to get the tests to run.
Thanks Alan for your comments. Resubmitting the patch to run unit tests

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12882487/HIVE-17277.patch

ATTACHMENT ID: 12882487 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

yuan_zac
The PTest framework was restarted while your tests were running so the results will not be updated in this Jira.
I reuploaded the same patch (HIVE-17277.2.patch) to retrigger the testing for you.
Sorry for the inconvenience.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12882538/HIVE-17277.3.patch
